item.title: About
item.dc:creator: shravanh
item.content:encoded:
ABOUT ME

SHRAVANKUMAR
HIREGOUDAR

shravankumarhiregoudar@gmail.com
LinkedIn | Portfolio | Medium

Over the past 5 years, I've taken the lead on numerous data and AI projects that highlight my ability to deliver comprehensive solutions with significant impact on businesses. My edge comes from more than just my technical skills; it's also about how I connect with clients and businesses. I excel at understanding their needs and crafting tailored solutions to address those specific challenges effectively.

R E S U M E

EDUCATION

Rutgers Business School, Rutgers University, NJ

Master of Science in Information Technology and Analytics

08/2018 - 12/2019
Data Science, Statistics and Machine Learning, Data Analysis and Decision Making, Business Data Management, Web Analytics, Marketing Management, Time Series Analysis, Analytics for Business Intelligence 

B V Bhoomaraddi College of Engineering & Technology, Hubli, India

Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science and Engineering

06/2014 - 05/2018
Data Mining and Business Analysis, Applied Statistics and Probability, Database Management Systems, Software Engineering, Data Structures and Algorithms, Programming in python

WORK EXPERIENCE

06/2024 - CURRENT

AI/ML - PRODUCT OPERATIONS | INSIGHTS

06/2024 - CURRENT

Leading the efforts to identify and eliminate friction points in our products by leveraging AI/ML techniques.

11/2020 - 06/2024 (~3.5 years)

CONSULTANT - DATA & ANALYTICS

01/2022 - 06/2024

➊ AI Practitioner
Led the forefront of the Generative AI technical transformation for 14 unique clients and 20+ teams across industries, bringing in $3M in revenue. Developed the debut LLM solutions for 5 of these teams. Additionally, facilitated AI workshops and developed frameworks to enable the rapid transformation of GenAI ideas and use cases into actionable solutions to drive business value and broader organizational impact.

Developed and deployed a comprehensive E2E solution, connecting Azure services (AI search, Doc Intelligence, SQL DB) alongside OpenAI’s chat and embedding models to engineer a state-of-the-art information retrieval platform. Boosted unstructured multi-source information processing and retrieval efficiency, achieving a 70% faster response rate over traditional search methods.

➋ ML Engineer
Transformative impact on issue management by implementing a custom summarization model, seamlessly fused with a Markovian method, synthesizes data from diverse streams, delivering instant, prioritized alerts. By offering a centralized view of top data issues on a Python flask application, this innovative solution optimized operations and delivered a 35% increase in business performance.

➌ NLP Engineer
Revolutionized organizational change management by leveraging employee feedback data through advanced sentiment analysis and topic modeling techniques. This provided actionable insights to executives and leaders, empowering them to prioritize and develop effective change strategies, leading to a marked improvement in the planning, implementation, and communication of change initiatives by 30%.

ASSOCIATE CONSULTANT - DATA & ANALYTICS

11/2020 - 01/2022

➊ Data Architect
Integrated client's delivery and customer-related data from EDL to the azure CDL by providing a data strategy for Consumer and Medical Devices across NA and EMEA that compliments and leverages the enterprise CDL. Identified client key stakeholders, analyzed the current state architecture, and performed a gap analysis to document high-level As-Is Architecture of source systems along with the priority of migration.

➋ Data Visualization Specialist
Transformed client operations by migrating their on-prem data to the powerful Azure cloud, unlocking a wealth of new opportunities. Delivered real-time, visually impactful representations of historical and projected provider data through executive dashboards powered by PowerBI, resulting in a 12% boost in client revenue.

⦿ Developed and rolled out an ML community of practice and training programs for new analysts and business consultants that increased ML projects across the market and helped beginners get started with ML.

06/2019 - 10/2020 (~1.5 years)

DATA SCIENTIST 

02/2020 - 10/2020

Client: United States Air Force (USAF)

  • Implemented field-level aviation fuel contamination analysis via an integrated suite of miniaturized sensors, including NIR Spectroscopy for USAF, assembled a unique sensor by integrating the hardware components and accessories for VIS, NIR & MIR sensing
  • Achieved 95% classification accuracy and over 80% R2 values for predicting property of fuel. Applied SVD and PCA to perform Multi-Block data analysis to decide the best sensor combination, and the results were integrated in an IOS application

Client: Pharmaceutical company

  • Implemented on-going research paper on Process Analytical Technology (PAT) to monitor low dose formulation in a table press feed frame using spatially resolved Near-Infrared spectroscopy by applying machine learning techniques
  • Evaluated the effect of physical interface on API concentration by building PLS and SVR models and achieved 99.2% prediction accuracy on the concentration of the tablets. Further, proved ML models performed 8% better than linear techniques such as PLS

DATA SCIENTIST CO-OP

09/2019 - 12/2019

Client: United States Department of Agriculture (USDA) 

  • Succeeded in predicting soil macronutrients for precision agriculture using miniature sensor and ML, which allows the farmer to adjust fertilizer nutrient application rates based on local requirements resulting in a tremendous increase in yields of crops
  • Responsible for a major modification to the approach which reduced the cost of the sensor by 60% and enhanced the performance by 350% compared to the traditional method

DATA SCIENTIST INTERN

06/2019 - 08/2019

Client: A large Winery 

  • Applied Support Vector Regressor by running computational experiments and fine-tuning the model parameters to predict the sugar and alcohol level in the Gallo wine and achieved 96% test accuracy
  • Improved results by developing RF feature selection and outlier detection and rebuilt the RF and KNN models on these selected features to achieve 98% test accuracy. Deployed the project on a product which is currently being manufactured and scaled

UNDERGRADUATE RESEARCH ASSISTANT

07/2017 - 05/2018

Research Paper Publication

  • Designed a voice-based interface to communicate with the database using Python, SQL, Speech Recognition System, Natural Language Processing concepts. Hence, to enhance efficient interaction between user and DBMS 
  • Performed comprehensive research on existing literature on natural language processing and speech recognition engine to identify the issues and overcome them by adding the synonym table for better mapping results which resulted in 96% accuracy 
  • Published research paper: International Journal of Research in Signal Processing & Communication System Design 4 (2), 2018, 01-05

CAPSTONE PROJECT - RESCUE THE FARMERS

07/2016 - 04/2017

Big data analytics project

  • Performed a case study to understand the flaws in the current agricultural product bidding process by interviewing the farmers and traders; Conclusion: Agricultural products of the farmer was not given a fair price during the local bidding process by the traders
  • Built a mobile application that predicts the cost of the agricultural product based on the twenty years of previous records and allows the farmer to set his price.
  • The database was stored in hive tables in AWS, and the data analysis is achieved by using map-reduce functions of Hadoop using SQL, and the results are displayed on the android application.
  • Boosted customer satisfaction by 40% and mobile users by 350% in 2017. GitHub

KEY SKILLS

  • Data Fields: ML, AI (Generative and Predictive), NLP, Data Engineering, Statistics, A/B Testing
  • Cloud: Azure, AWS, Databricks, ETL (Matillion, Talend)
  • Visualization: Power BI, Tableau, PySpark
  • Language: Python, R, SQL

CERTIFICATIONS

AWS Machine Learning – Specialty

Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Fundamentals

Reltio MDM Configuration Specialist

GCP Generative AI fundamentals 

Github Medium Linkedin-in Instagram Youtube Camera-retro

item.title: Publications
item.dc:creator: shravanh
item.content:encoded:
PUBLISHED WORK

SPEECH TO SQL GENERATOR, A VOICE BASED APPROACH

Abstract: Recent developments in speech recognition system and natural language processing have given rise to a new generation of powerful voice-based interfaces. In this proposed system, a user interacts with the system through a voice-based user interface to fetch the desired results. To make the system smooth and interactive, the query is based on casual human speech/conversation. The spoken query undergoes many steps to arrive at the final results. It includes synonym table which is used to convert the spoken query into SQL keywords. This proposed work will give the good results for simple and complex queries. The accuracy of the system depends on the complexity of the database. This system will show that the voice-based user interface is an effective means of querying and fetching data from the stored database.

Research Paper Github Medium Linkedin-in Instagram Youtube Camera-retro

item.title: Blogs
item.dc:creator: shravanh
item.content:encoded:
ARTICLES

Published Blogs 0 Views +

Breaking into Product from Consulting: A Personal Journey

After 3.5 years as a consultant, where I drove AI and data science solutions, I transitioned six months ago to a product insights team. This article explores my journey and the lessons I learned during the shift.

FULL ARTICLE

Integrating Generative AI with Human Expertise

As organizations integrate Gen AI more deeply, it's essential to determine the right level of human oversight. This blog discusses finding the balance between AI's capabilities and human insight.

FULL ARTICLE

Zero-Shot Learning and Human Analogical Reasoning!

I was inspired by the striking resemblance between this concept and how ML algorithms tackle zero-shot learning (ZSL) methods. I want to share the lightbulb moments and insights with you here!

FULL ARTICLE

Unlocking Document Intelligence: E2E Azure-Powered Chatbot with Vector-Based Search (Part 2 — Q&A)

Querying the existing vector store from (Part 1 — Embedding) using the natural language questions that drive the heart of our document processing pipeline.

FULL ARTICLE

Unlocking Document Intelligence: E2E Azure-Powered Chatbot with Vector-Based Search (Part 1 — Embedding)

Embark on a remarkable journey into document processing. Delve into the development of a robust document embedding mechanism and the creation of a vector store, setting the stage for streamlined and optimized querying.

FULL ARTICLE

Build Your First Generative AI Chatbot

Learn how to integrate a pre trained LLM with your database to build a chatbot for efficient domain-specific query responses.

FULL ARTICLE

Set Operations on Python DataFrames

We often perform join, union, difference, intersection, etc. operations between Python DataFrames. Throughout my data science journey, Understanding the concepts of Set Theory has helped me perform these tasks efficiently. In this article, I would like to use the set theory to implement DataFrame operations.

FULL ARTICLE

NLP Use Case With AWS Comprehend

This article covers concepts of Natural Language Processing and how to derive insights from text data using the components of AWS Comprehend.

FULL ARTICLE

AWS Certified Machine Learning Specialty — Resources and Experience

This article covers my experience in getting certified with AWS Certified Machine Learning — Specialty, and I have shared the resources and cheat sheets, which helped me understand concepts!

FULL ARTICLE

One Year as Data Analytics Consultant— What's Unique About It?

This article covers my experience at Slalom as an Associate Consultant in the Data & Analytics practice. Previously, I worked in an R&D company as an in-house Data Scientist. 

FULL ARTICLE

5 Reasons to Start Journaling Today!

Journaling has been an effective method to clear my mind and share my thoughts! On and off, I have been journaling for almost seven years, and it has helped me organize my thoughts into actions and unclutter my mind. Sharing my experience of journaling and how it has helped me to think clearer. Happy reading!

FULL ARTICLE

Advanced Project Ideas for Data Science Graduates/Enthusiasts to Ease Their Job Search

Data science is an immense field. It can go from placing salsa near chips in a local shop to a Mars rover! I will share a few project ideas to enable you to do more realistic projects that are best suited for the current technology and business scenario.

FULL ARTICLE

Data Science Job Search —
What worked for me?

Based on my job search experience, I would like to share some of the not-so-popular techniques to ease the job search and get interviews

FULL ARTICLE

Ways to Evaluate Regression Models

The very naïve way of evaluating a model is by considering the R-Squared value. Suppose if I get an R-Squared of 95%, is that good enough? Through this blog, Let us try and understand the ways to evaluate your regression model.

FULL ARTICLE

Publish Python Project Documentation on Confluence/HTML using Sphinx

In this article, We will look into the file documentation generated by Sphinx. This documentation generator can create .pdf, .HTML, or publish the technical documentation page to a Confluence instance.

FULL ARTICLE

Entire Application and Admission Process for Master’s in the USA

I would like to explain the entire procedure of doing a master’s in the USA. It’s from the perspective of an Indian student. (Wrote on Jan 2019)

FULL ARTICLE

Scatter correction and outlier detection in NIR spectroscopy

Recent advancements in the field of AI have given rise to the integration of NIR sensor data and machine learning techniques to achieve the results. In this article, The NIR sensor is interfaced with a PC and the samples were scanned. We performed ten scans per each sample with ten seconds scan time to reduce the errors and include all the parts of the sample. In our case, the scan results were scattered and, we had outliers due to change in the light, working distance and human errors during the scanning. To reduce the scattering and to eliminate the outliers, we implemented Multiplicative Scatter Correction (MSC) and Standard Normal Variate (SNV) on near-infrared (NIR) data.

FULL ARTICLE Github Medium Linkedin-in Instagram Youtube Camera-retro

Recent advancements in the field of AI have given rise to the integration of NIR sensor data and machine learning techniques to achieve the results. In this article, The NIR sensor is interfaced with a PC and the samples were scanned. We performed ten scans per each sample with ten seconds scan time to reduce the errors and include all the parts of the sample. In our case, the scan results were scattered and, we had outliers due to change in the light, working distance and human errors during the scanning. To reduce the scattering and to eliminate the outliers, we implemented Multiplicative Scatter Correction (MSC) and Standard Normal Variate (SNV) on near-infrared (NIR)
